title: Weather: Warnings (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Warnings subcategory within Weather. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: During winter and spring, weather forecasters often call people's attention to avalanches.
cards.romaji: fuyu to haru no aida wa, tenki yoh de nadare ni taisuru ch.i o yobikakemasu.
cards.japanese: 冬と春の間は、天気予報で雪崩に対する注意を呼びかけます。
